description: This file provides utility functions for accessing environment variables within a React app, including retrieving strings, URLs, parsing feature flags, and enabling backend calls based on environment configuration.

methods.name: getEnvString(key, fallback)
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable value as a string, falling back to a default if undefined, null, or empty.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables, defaulting to 'http://localhost:3001'.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Parses the 'REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS' environment variable as JSON, returning an object or empty object on failure.

methods.name: isBackendEnabled()
methods.description: Determines whether backend calls are enabled based on environment variable, defaulting to false.
